column4: Is there a way to setup my new iPod Touch I just got today with Ubuntu? I have a Windows 7 VM, but I can't seem to get it to work. someone help please!!!!!
yeah you need to set it so it's not mtp (that's for windows) let me get my mp3 player brb
see if you can set the device to msc mode.  then it will work on linux.  my sansa fuse has an option for that.  msc mode will make it look like a hard drive.
I can't do anything with it. All it shows is a charger cord with a arrow up to itunes
